name: A Fox's Heart
description:
A game about a woman’s journey towards self-discovery and healing. This is symbolized by the fox, and the fox tries to collect the memories to restore the islands to their rightful state. Because the islands represent the fractured heart of the girl, and the fox is trying to repair it to its rightful state. Each level fixes an island, a piece of the girls heart, by using the memories.

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2020, made by a group based in UC Irvine

(Zot Zot)
